hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple MQ Raised Island Courtyard Lower Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #before the Truth Spinner gap# in the Shadow Temple locked chests contain...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Flame Circle Chest
